pullRequest.title: PlayerChunkLoadEvent / PlayerChunkUnloadEvent
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adds the following:

PlayerChunkLoadEvent / PlayerChunkUnloadEvent (Can be used to autorespawn fake entities when client receives chunk)

Probably Mini appreciate at least the two events for his lightweight Citizens replacement.

beforeCommit.message: added ability to register attribute to entities

afterCommit.message:
added PlayerChunkReceiveEvent

@@ -0,0 +1,54 @@
+From 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 Mon Sep 17 00:00:00 2001
+From: ysl3000 <yannicklamprecht@live.de>
+Date: Mon, 5 Oct 2020 21:24:45 +0200
+Subject: [PATCH] added PlayerChunkReceiveEvent
+
+
+diff --git a/src/main/java/org/bukkit/event/packet/PlayerChunkReceiveEvent.java b/src/main/java/org/bukkit/event/packet/PlayerChunkReceiveEvent.java
+new file mode 100644
+index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..e23bb5de0cd72a8181f7c92a029b7715732a6aa9
+--- /dev/null
++++ b/src/main/java/org/bukkit/event/packet/PlayerChunkReceiveEvent.java
+@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
++package org.bukkit.event.packet;
++
++import org.bukkit.Chunk;
++import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
++import org.bukkit.event.HandlerList;
++import org.bukkit.event.world.ChunkEvent;
++import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
++
++/**
++ * Is called before a {@link org.bukkit.entity.Player} receives a {@link org.bukkit.Chunk}
++ * used for e.g. Spawning a fake entity when the player receives a chunk
++ *
++ * Should only be used for packet/clientside related stuff.
++ * Not intended for modifying server side.
++ */
++public class PlayerChunkReceiveEvent extends ChunkEvent {
++
++    private static final HandlerList handlers = new HandlerList();
++

@@ -0,0 +1,88 @@
+From 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 Mon Sep 17 00:00:00 2001
+From: ysl3000 <yannicklamprecht@live.de>
+Date: Mon, 12 Oct 2020 23:06:57 +0200
+Subject: [PATCH] added PlayerEntityReceiveEvent
+
+
+diff --git a/src/main/java/org/bukkit/event/packet/PlayerEntityReceiveEvent.java b/src/main/java/org/bukkit/event/packet/PlayerEntityReceiveEvent.java
+new file mode 100644
+index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..d4709278b139d3b3d84820828d7068de0e78574c
+--- /dev/null
++++ b/src/main/java/org/bukkit/event/packet/PlayerEntityReceiveEvent.java
+@@ -0,0 +1,76 @@
++package org.bukkit.event.packet;
++

@@ -0,0 +1,88 @@ +From 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 Mon Sep 17 00:00:00 2001 +From: ysl3000 +Date: Mon, 12 Oct 2020 23:06:57 +0200 +Subject: [PATCH] added PlayerEntityReceiveEvent + + +diff --git a/src/main/java/org/bukkit/event/packet/PlayerEntityReceiveEvent.java b/src/main/java/org/bukkit/event/packet/PlayerEntityReceiveEvent.java +new file mode 100644 +index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..d4709278b139d3b3d84820828d7068de0e78574c +--- /dev/null ++++ b/src/main/java/org/bukkit/event/packet/PlayerEntityReceiveEvent.java +@@ -0,0 +1,76 @@ ++package org.bukkit.event.packet; ++ ++import org.bukkit.entity.Entity; ++import org.bukkit.entity.Player; ++import org.bukkit.event.Cancellable; ++import org.bukkit.event.Event; ++import org.bukkit.event.HandlerList; ++import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull; ++ ++/** ++ * Is called before a {@link Player} receives a {@link Entity}. ++ * ++ * E.g. can be used for the following: ++ * ++ *
    ++ *
  • Hiding all kind of entities by calling {@link Cancellable#setCancelled(boolean)} with value true
    • ++ *
  • Disguising entities as others e.g. player npc. ++ * Cancel the event and replace it with a playerpacket with the same entity id. ++ *
    • ++ *
++ */ ++public class PlayerEntityReceiveEvent extends Event implements Cancellable { ++ ++ private static final HandlerList handlers = new HandlerList(); ++ ++ private final Player player; ++ ++ private final Entity entity; ++ ++ private boolean cancelled; ++ ++

@@ -0,0 +1,88 @@ +From 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 Mon Sep 17 00:00:00 2001 +From: ysl3000 +Date: Mon, 12 Oct 2020 23:06:57 +0200 +Subject: [PATCH] added PlayerEntityReceiveEvent + + +diff --git a/src/main/java/org/bukkit/event/packet/PlayerEntityReceiveEvent.java b/src/main/java/org/bukkit/event/packet/PlayerEntityReceiveEvent.java +new file mode 100644 +index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..d4709278b139d3b3d84820828d7068de0e78574c +--- /dev/null ++++ b/src/main/java/org/bukkit/event/packet/PlayerEntityReceiveEvent.java +@@ -0,0 +1,76 @@ ++package org.bukkit.event.packet; ++ ++import org.bukkit.entity.Entity; ++import org.bukkit.entity.Player; ++import org.bukkit.event.Cancellable; ++import org.bukkit.event.Event; ++import org.bukkit.event.HandlerList; ++import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull; ++ ++/** ++ * Is called before a {@link Player} receives a {@link Entity}. ++ * ++ * E.g. can be used for the following: ++ * ++ *
    ++ *
  • Hiding all kind of entities by calling {@link Cancellable#setCancelled(boolean)} with value true
    • ++ *
  • Disguising entities as others e.g. player npc. ++ * Cancel the event and replace it with a playerpacket with the same entity id. ++ *
    • ++ *
++ */ ++public class PlayerEntityReceiveEvent extends Event implements Cancellable { ++ ++ private static final HandlerList handlers = new HandlerList(); ++ ++ private final Player player; ++

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,84 @@ +From 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 Mon Sep 17 00:00:00 2001 +From: ysl3000 +Date: Mon, 12 Oct 2020 23:06:57 +0200 +Subject: [PATCH] added PlayerEntityReceiveEvent + + +diff --git a/src/main/java/io/papermc/paper/event/packet/PlayerEntityReceiveEvent.java b/src/main/java/io/papermc/paper/event/packet/PlayerEntityReceiveEvent.java +new file mode 100644 +index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..9618b032031920c722b36f59bfbc3d6042d920fb +--- /dev/null ++++ b/src/main/java/io/papermc/paper/event/packet/PlayerEntityReceiveEvent.java +@@ -0,0 +1,72 @@ ++package io.papermc.paper.event.packet; ++ ++import org.bukkit.entity.Entity; ++import org.bukkit.entity.Player; ++import org.bukkit.event.Cancellable; ++import org.bukkit.event.Event; ++import org.bukkit.event.HandlerList; ++import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull; ++ ++/** ++ * Is called before a {@link Player} receives a {@link Entity}. ++ * ++ * E.g. can be used for the following: ++ * ++ *
    ++ *
  • Hiding all kind of entities by calling {@link Cancellable#setCancelled(boolean)} with value true
    • ++ *
  • Disguising entities as others e.g. player npc. ++ * Cancel the event and replace it with a playerpacket with the same entity id. ++ *
    • ++ *
++ */ ++public class PlayerEntityReceiveEvent extends Event implements Cancellable {

nodes.bodyText: Should also have a PlayerChunkUnloadEvent to complement this. So maybe name this PlayerChunkLoadEvent and PlayerChunkUnloadEvent

nodes.bodyText: we should also have an untrack event, so maybe this should be PlayerTrackEntityEvent and the other PlayerUntrackEntityEvent

nodes.bodyText:
All of these impl patches shouldnt say "added",
"<EventName>" by itself is fine or
"Player Chunk Load/Unload Events"
"Player Entity Tracking Events"
